join: Joins the channel you are in or the one you give the id to
leave: Leaves the channel I am currently in
pause: Pauses or resume the song depending on if it is already paused or not
stop: Stops the playing of current song
skip: Skips to the next song in the queue
previous: Goes back to the previous song in the queue
loop: Changes the loop type (not loopin, loop queue, loop current song)
remove: removes the song from the queue
jump: jumps to the song in the queue
